Posts.Content: pasimms wrote: Is there anyone out there to just put their faith in God believing for God's healing and refuse to do any chemo, radiation or hormone therapy after their surgery?  I was just diagnosed with breast cancer two weeks ago and going in for surgery on Sept 5th.  I have been doing lots of research and going crazy reading all the infro that is out there concerning this.   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: refusal to do chemo treatment pasimms carol1949
